table.name: vtiger_rsnqueriesvariables
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `vtiger_rsnqueriesvariables` ( `rsnqueriesvariablesid` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `name` VARCHAR(128) DEFAULT NULL, `label` VARCHAR(128) DEFAULT NULL, `defaultvalue` VARCHAR(128) DEFAULT NULL, `referencefield` VARCHAR(128) DEFAULT NULL, `type` VARCHAR(128) DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`rsnqueriesvariablesid`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8

table.name: vtiger_rsnqueriesvariablescf
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `vtiger_rsnqueriesvariablescf` ( `rsnqueriesvariablesid` int(11) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`rsnqueriesvariablesid`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8
